item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Dm, EM
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/

item.title: Taron Egerton - I'm Still Standing - Key of C, Cm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm and C. Raised a whole step from the original (Bbm and Bb). This is an updated video, just for the intro slide and the description. Sadly, you cannot update a video with a new version on YouTube. I left a link to this video on the original video.
As performed by Taron Egerton in “Sing.” I had originally had Taron Egerton's name wrong, and a number of people wrote comments to complain about it.
My boys enjoyed Sing and frequently sing this song. I had started working on but moved on to other videos. Katie Denure (One Music School) posted a tutorial today (https://youtu.be/m_Xoe9g00oc), which inspired me to wrap up this video. I took away some of the fast Ab Bb C changes that occur at the end of some phrases...feel free to add them back in your own practice. This video offers some good Barre chord practice (partial and full) with Cm, Ab, and Bb.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Visit the sister ukulele channel to this channel, YouTube.com/ukestuff

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music - Key of D
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Jack Johnson - Better Together - Key of F
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Better Together - Jack Johnson
Using the chords: A Bb C Dm F Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU XU DU XU or DU DU DU DU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Bruno Mars - Marry You - Key of F
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Marry You - Bruno Mars
Using the chords: Bb F Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea Ukulele Play Along - Key of F, A
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Keys of F and A.
Chords Used: F, Dm, Gm, C7, F7, Bb, Bbm,, C+, A, F#m, Bm, E7, G, Eb, C#7, Bdim7, Dm7
Original performance by George Harrison
[Corrected Version from the Original Upload]
Our local ukulele group is working on this song, and I was asked to check out the chords they are using (and the tablature they are using), and I made a play along video (there is no tablature in this song).
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (History, GCEA chords, & strumming) on the sister channel (please subscribe!): https://youtu.be/8bll9-iQLW8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Eric Clapton - Tears in Heaven - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: F, C, Dm Bb, A, Gm, Cm, D, C7
Tears in Heaven by Eric Clapton. This version does not have the bridge. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner ukulele students can play along. Some of the more complex chords have been simplified or skipped.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
